import Data.List

a = "aiueo"

enc1 :: String -> String
enc1 [] = []
enc1 (x0:[]) = []
enc1 (x0:x1:xs) =
  if x0 `elem` a
  then x1:enc1 (x1:xs)
  else enc1 (x1:xs)

encode :: Int -> String -> String
encode _ [] = []
encode n x@(x0:xs) =
  let e = x0:(enc1 x)
      e' = if length e <= n
           then e
           else take n e
  in
    e'

judge []     = True
judge (x:[]) = True
judge (x1:x2:xs)
  | x1 == x2  = False
  | otherwise = judge (x2:xs)

try :: Int -> Int -> [String] -> Int
try n m s
  | n == m    = -1
  | otherwise = 
    if judge $ sort $ map (encode n) s
    then n
    else try (n+1) m s

ans :: [String] -> [Int]
ans [] = []
ans ("0":_) = []
ans (n:ss) =
  let n' = read n :: Int
      i  = take n' ss
      m  = maximum $ map length i
      c  = try 0 m i
  in
    c:(ans $ drop n' ss)
      
main = do
  c <- getContents
  let i = lines c
      o = ans i
  mapM_ print o

import Data.List

a = "aiueo"

enc1 :: String -> String
enc1 [] = []
enc1 (x0:[]) = []
enc1 (x0:x1:xs) =
  if x0 `elem` a
  then x1:enc1 (x1:xs)
  else enc1 (x1:xs)

encode :: Int -> String -> String
encode _ [] = []
encode n x@(x0:xs) =
  let e = x0:(enc1 x)
      e' = if length e <= n
           then e
           else take n e
  in
    e'

judge []     = True
judge (x:[]) = True
judge (x1:x2:xs)
  | x1 == x2  = False
  | otherwise = judge (x2:xs)

try :: Int -> Int -> [String] -> Int
try n m s
  | n > m    = -1
  | otherwise = 
    if judge $ sort $ map (encode n) s
    then n
    else try (n+1) m s

ans :: [String] -> [Int]
ans [] = []
ans ("0":_) = []
ans (n:ss) =
  let n' = read n :: Int
      i  = take n' ss
      m  = maximum $ map length i
      c  = try 0 m i
  in
    c:(ans $ drop n' ss)
      
main = do
  c <- getContents
  let i = lines c
      o = ans i
  mapM_ print o

import Control.Applicative
import Control.Monad
import Data.Set (Set)
import qualified Data.Set as S

main :: IO ()
main = do
  n <- readLn
  unless (n == 0) $ do
    solve n <$> replicateM n getLine >>= print
    main

solve :: Int -> [String] -> Int
solve n ss = f 1
  where
    cs = map code ss
    f k
      | k > 50 = (-1)
      | otherwise = let st = S.fromList $ map (take k) cs
                    in if S.size st == n
                       then k
                       else f (k + 1)

code :: String -> String
code s = let vs = "aiueo"
             xs = map snd $ filter (flip elem vs . fst) $ zip s (tail s)
         in head s : xs

def generate_ac(name)
  ac = name[0]

  name.split("").each_cons(2){|n| ac += n[1] if n[0].match(/[aiueo]/)}
  
  ac
end

def calc_minimam_k(ac_list)
  return -1 if ac_list.uniq.size == 1
  
  max_ac_length = ac_list.max_by{|ac| ac.length }.length
  
  max_ac_length.times do |n|
    return n + 1 if ac_list.uniq.size == ac_list.map{ |ac| ac[0..n] }.uniq.size
  end
end

loop do
  n = gets.to_i
  break if n == 0
  ac_list = []
  
  n.times do
    ac_list << generate_ac(gets.chomp)
  end
  
  puts calc_minimam_k(ac_list)
end

while n = STDIN.gets
  if n == "0\n" then break end
  n = n.chomp.to_i
  airport_codes=[]
  max_length=0
  n.times do 
    airport_name = STDIN.gets.chomp
    airport_code=""
    airport_name.chars.each_with_index do |c, i|
      if i == 0 or airport_name[i-1] == 'a' or airport_name[i-1] == 'i' or airport_name[i-1] == 'u' or airport_name[i-1] == 'e' or airport_name[i-1] == 'o' then
        airport_code += c 
      end 
    end
    airport_codes.push(airport_code)
    if max_length < airport_code.length then
      max_length = airport_code.length
    end
  end
  airport_codes_substring=[]
  k=-1
  (0...max_length).each do |i|
    airport_codes_substring =  airport_codes.map { |code| code[0..i] }
    has_duplicate = airport_codes_substring.find { |code| airport_codes_substring.count(code) > 1 }
    if has_duplicate == nil then 
      k = i+1
      break 
    end 
  end
  puts k
end

def generate_ac(name)
  ac = name[0]

  name.split("").each_cons(2){|n| ac += n[1] if n[0].match(/[aiueo]/)}
  
  ac
end

def calc_minimam_k(ac_list)
  return -1 if ac_list.uniq.size == 1
  
  max_ac_length = ac_list.max_by{|ac| ac.length }.length
  
  max_ac_length.times do |n|
    return n + 1 if ac_list.uniq.size == ac_list.map{ |ac| ac[0..n] }.uniq.size
  end
end

loop do
  n = gets.to_i
  break if n == 0
  ac_list = []
  
  n.times do
    ac_list << generate_ac(gets.chomp)
  end
  
  puts calc_minimam_k(ac_list)
end

loop do
  n = gets.to_i
  break if n == 0
  s = []
  longest = 0
  n.times do
    str = gets.chomp
    replaced = str[0]
    str.chars.each_cons(2) do |ch1, ch2|
      replaced += ch2 if ch1.match(/[aiueo]/)
    end
    s << replaced
    longest = replaced.size if replaced.size > longest
  end

  k = 0
  succeed = false
  ns = []
  while k <= longest
    k += 1
    ns = s.map { |str| str[0...k] }
    if ns.uniq.size == ns.size
      succeed = true
      puts k
      break
    end
  end

  puts -1 unless succeed
end

def shin(chara)
	if chara != 'a' && chara != 'i' && chara != 'u' && chara != 'e' && chara != 'o' 
		return true
	end
	return false
end

N = gets.to_i
while N > 0
	memory = []
	res = []
	maxsize = 0
	for i in 0..N-1
		res << ""
		tmp = gets
		memory << tmp
		#
		bch = 'a'
		cnt = 0
		for j in 0..memory[i].size-1
			tmp2 = memory[i][cnt]
			memory[i][cnt] = '!' if shin(bch)
			bch = tmp2
			cnt = cnt + 1
		end
		memory[i] = memory[i].delete('!').delete("\n")
		#p memory[i]
		#
		maxsize = memory[i].size if memory[i].size > maxsize
	end
	#p maxsize
	count = 0
	while res.size != res.uniq.size || count == 0
		if count >= maxsize
			count = 0
			break
		end
		for i in 0..N-1
			res[i] << memory[i][count] if count < memory[i].size
			#p res[i]
		end
		count += 1
	end
	if count > 1
		p count
	elsif count == 1
		p 1
	else
		p -1
	end
	N = gets.to_i
end

  return -1 unless ac_list.uniq.size == ac_list.size

  max_ac_length.times do |n|
    return n + 1 if ac_list.uniq.size == ac_list.map{ |ac| ac[0..n] }.uniq.size
  end
end

  ac_list = []

    ac_list << generate_ac(gets.chomp)
  end
  
  puts calc_minimam_k(ac_list)
end

    end
  end

  puts -1
end

#!/usr/bin/ruby
def vowel?(char)
  "aeiuo".split("").include? char
end

def makeCodes(airport, k)
  string = ''
  vowel = false

  airport.split("").each_with_index do |ch, index|
    # validation
    if k < 1
      break
    end

    if airport.length <= index
      break
    end

    # add code a char
    if index == 0
      string << ch

      k -= 1
      if vowel? ch
        vowel = true
      end
      next
    end

    if vowel == true
      string << ch

      k -= 1
    end

    # update vowel flag
    if vowel? ch
      vowel = true
    else
      vowel = false
    end

  end
  string
end


while (n = STDIN.gets.chomp.to_i) != 0
  airports = []
  n.times do
    airports << STDIN.gets.chomp
  end

  funiq = true
  (1..airports.map{|x| x.length}.max).each do |k|
    airportCodes = Hash.new
    funiq = true

    airports.each do |airport|
      codes = makeCodes(airport, k)
      if airportCodes.has_key? codes
        funiq = false
        break
      else
        airportCodes[codes] = 1
      end
    end

    if funiq == true
      puts k
      break
    end
  end

  if funiq == false
    puts -1
  end
end

#!/usr/bin/ruby
def shin(chara)
	if chara != 'a' && chara != 'i' && chara != 'u' && chara != 'e' && chara != 'o' 
		return true
	end
	return false
end

N = gets.to_i
while N > 0
	memory = []
	res = []
	maxsize = 0
	for i in 0..N-1
		res << ""
		tmp = gets
		memory << tmp
		#
		bch = 'a'
		cnt = 0
		for j in 0..memory[i].size-1
			tmp2 = memory[i][cnt]
			memory[i][cnt] = '!' if shin(bch)
			bch = tmp2
			cnt = cnt + 1
		end
		memory[i] = memory[i].delete('!').delete("\n")
		#p memory[i]
		#
		maxsize = memory[i].size if memory[i].size > maxsize
	end
	#p maxsize
	count = 0
	while res.size != res.uniq.size || count == 0
		if count >= maxsize
			count = 0
			break
		end
		for i in 0..N-1
			res[i] << memory[i][count] if count < memory[i].size
			#p res[i]
		end
		count += 1
	end
	if count > 1
		p count
	elsif count == 1
		p 1
	else
		p -1
	end
	N = gets.to_i
end

let encode s =
  let n = String.length s in
  let rec doit i acc =
    if i = n - 1 then List.rev acc
    else if String.contains "aeiou" s.[i] then doit (i + 1) (s.[i+1] :: acc)
    else doit (i + 1) acc
  in
  doit 0 [s.[0]]

let rec dup_p = function
  | [] -> false
  | hd :: tl when List.mem hd tl -> true
  | _ :: tl -> dup_p tl

let solve n =
  let rec read i acc =
    if i = n then List.rev acc
    else read (i + 1) (encode (read_line ()) :: acc)
  in
  let l = List.sort compare (read 0 []) in
  if dup_p l then (-1)
  else
    let rec duduwa k = function
      | ([], _) -> k
      | (_, []) -> k
      | (x::_, y::_) when x <> y -> k
      | (_::xs, _::ys) -> duduwa (k + 1) (xs, ys)
    and doit k = function
      | [] -> k
      | [_] -> k
      | x :: (y :: _ as tl) -> doit (max k (duduwa 0 (x, y))) tl
    in
    1 + doit 0 l

let () =
  let rec doit () =
    let n = read_int () in
    if n <> 0 then (Printf.printf "%d\n" (solve n); doit ())
  in
  doit ()

let encode s =
  let n = String.length s in
  let rec doit i acc =
    if i = n - 1 then List.rev acc
    else if String.contains "aeiou" s.[i] then doit (i + 1) (s.[i+1] :: acc)
    else doit (i + 1) acc
  in
  doit 0 [s.[0]]

let rec dup_p = function
  | [] -> false
  | hd :: tl when List.mem hd tl -> true
  | _ :: tl -> dup_p tl

let solve n =
  let rec read i acc =
    if i = n then List.rev acc
    else read (i + 1) (encode (read_line ()) :: acc)
  in
  let l = List.sort (fun a b -> List.length a - List.length b) (read 0 []) in
  if dup_p l then (-1)
  else
    let rec duduwa k = function
      | ([], _) -> k
      | (_, []) -> k
      | (x::xs, y::ys) when x <> y -> k
      | (_::xs, _::ys) -> duduwa (k + 1) (xs, ys)
    and doit acc = function
      | [] -> acc + 1
      | [x] -> acc + 1
      | x :: y :: z -> doit (max acc (duduwa 0 (x, y))) z
    in
    doit 0 l

let () =
  let rec doit () =
    let n = read_int () in
    if n <> 0 then (Printf.printf "%d\n" (solve n); doit ())
  in
  doit ()

while 1:
    n=int(input())
    if n==0:break
    code=[]
    slmax=0
    for i in range(n):
        s=input()
        s_code=s[0]
        flag=0
        for j in range(len(s)-1):
            if s[j]=="a" or s[j]=="i" or s[j]=="u" or s[j]=="e" or s[j]=="o":s_code+=s[j+1]
        slmax=max(slmax,len(s_code))
        code.append(s_code)
    l_c=len(code)
    if l_c!=len(list(set(code))):
        print(-1)
    else:
        flag=0
        for i in range(1,slmax+1):
            if flag==1:break
            c_code=[]
            for j in code:
                c_code.append(j[:i])
                if len(list(set(c_code)))==l_c:
                    print(i)
                    flag=1
                    break
